title: Reverse engineering in pairs - is it possible?
content:
I'm interested if anyone can share from his experience how to analyze complex binaries in pairs - 2 RE engineers. Are there any suitable methodologies, tools to help in such work?

UPDATE

This is indeed partly a duplicated question regarding tools, but not methodologies.

comments.text: possible duplicate of Tools to work cooperatively on the same binary
Don't really agree with you, I think it's quiet the opposite.

answers_data.content: I don't know any concurrent solution that enables data exchange in realtime. But for IDA users there is collabreate which seems to allow to push/pull database changes.
